message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $170. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise again, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $160 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $165. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price for the product.
I understand your concerns, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to pay $162.50 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
